NormDistr
normDistr.
Normal distribution
Purpose
: getting the value (number) of the normal distribution from a series of arguments.
Syntax:
Parameters:
Expression – expression whose distribution is calculated;
Median – mean distribution;
Standard deviation – standard deviation.
The function is most often used to calculate economic and financial indicators. For more information, refer to
Calculated indicators
.
